name: ddclient
description: ddclient is a lightweight dynamic DNS update client written in Perl. It supports multiple DDNS providers to keep your domain pointing to your home server or dynamic IP, running as a CLI or daemon in server environments.
features: Dynamic DNS Updates: Keep domains pointing to changing IPs automatically. Always accessible.
Multi-Provider Support: Works with dozens of DDNS services. Choose your preferred provider.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage with Perl-based efficiency. Perfect for any server.
Daemon Mode: Runs continuously in the background. Set and forget operation.
Home Server Ready: Ideal for self-hosted services with dynamic IPs. Reliable remote access.
Battle-Tested: Mature, stable solution used for decades. Proven reliability.
